gameobjects.actors

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobjects.UniqueObject
      • gameobjects.Itemholder
        • gameobjects.actors.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player

    public abstract class Actor
extends Itemholder
    Base class for all actors in the game. Actors have health and they are located in some tunnel block. They are also itemholders.

      • Fields inherited from class gameobjects.UniqueObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        protected Actor(int id)
        Create a new Actor.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique id.

    • Method Detail

      • pickUpItems

        public final void pickUpItems()
        Adds all the items on the block of the actor to his inventory.

      • die

        public boolean die()
        Erases the actor from the game, if the actor is dead.
        Returns:
        Did the actor die.

      • retreat

        public final void retreat()
        Makes the actor retreat to the last tunnel block he remembers.

      • isAlive

        public final boolean isAlive()
        Determines, wheter the actor has is alive. Actor is alive when he has positive health.
        Returns:
        Is the actor alive or not.

      • getHealth

        public final int getHealth()
        Get the health of the actor.
        Returns:
        Health of the actor.

      • getMyBlock

        public final Tunnel getMyBlock()
        Returns the block on which the actor is currently on.
        Returns:
        The block on which the actor is currently on.

      • isPlayerControlled

        public abstract boolean isPlayerControlled()
        Tells whether the actor is contolled by a human or not.
        Returns:
        Is the actor human.

      • setMyBlock

        public final void setMyBlock(Tunnel newBlock)
        Moves the Actor to another block. Saves the previous block. Removes the actor from the previous block and adds to the new one. The amount of blocks remembered is defined in constants.
        Parameters:
        newBlock - Where to move.

      • attack

        public final void attack(Actor to,
          BattleAction act)
        Current actor attacks the target actor.
        Parameters:
        to - The actor into which the damage is inflicted.
        act - Multiplies the default damage by the action.

      • getAttack

        protected int getAttack(BattleAction act)
        Get the damage which is inflicted when attacking.
        Parameters:
        act - The BattleAction leading to the attack.
        Returns:
        The damage to be inflicted.

      • takeHit

        public final void takeHit(int amount)
        The actor takes the damage.
        Parameters:
        amount - How much damage is inflicted.

      • getHitDamage

        protected int getHitDamage(int amount)
        Get the damage, after it is modified by items and possibly any racial bonuses.
        Parameters:
        amount - The original amount.
        Returns:
        The modified amount.

      • heal

        public final void heal()
        The actor heals itself. The amount is defined by the constant ACTOR_HEAL_RATE and any items the actor may possess.

      • heal

        protected final void heal(int amount)
        Heals the actor by certain amount. Cannot heal over maximum health defined in the constants. Items may modify the amount of health gained.
        Parameters:
        amount - How much to heal, may be modified by items.
